title: Smallest sample to estimate proportion with child

content.question: The manager of a car company will select a random sample of its customers to create a 90 percent confidence interval to estimate the proportion of its customers who have children. Of the following, which is the smallest sample size that will result in a margin of error of no more than 6 percentage points?

topic.text: 6.2: Constructing a Confidence Interval for a Population Proportion

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
